about_the_game:
Downtown Shuffle combines the strategic depth of deckbuilding with the creative challenge of city planning, all wrapped in a fast-paced battle of wits. Face off against eccentric rival mayors who will stop at nothing to sabotage your perfect city. Craft unique decks, collect powerful items, and discover clever building combos to outsmart your foes and create the ultimate urban masterpiece.

Battle Rival Mayors

Each rival in Downtown Shuffle brings their own unique cards, mechanics, and dirty tricks. You're the unwelcome guest in their city, and they’ll do everything they can to tarnish your reputation and get you fired.


Survive the Shuffle

Downtown Shuffle is a standalone game mode for Downtown Dealers. Start each run with a randomized deck and tackle unexpected challenges, quirky rewards, and chaotic twists. Every playthrough is unique, pushing you to adapt your strategy on the fly. With a massive range of cards, abilities, and upgrades to choose from, no two cities will ever look the same!

Build Your Deck

Buildings, upgrades, city-wide effects, and more—every card in your deck shapes the city you create. From luxury apartments to cozy cafes, assemble a vibrant urban sprawl and experiment with unique building combos to unlock powerful synergies. Will your city thrive on charm, efficiency, or sheer chaos? The choice is yours.

short_description: Downtown Shuffle is a chaotic mashup of roguelike deck-building, card battling, and city building! Outwit eccentric rivals—like park rangers, construction workers, and even an army of vampires—as they sabotage your reputation. Build the best city, survive the shuffle, and outlast the chaos!
